summary: Ecosystem refers to a specific geographic area with a community of living organisms and their physical environment, but the concept has grown to include metaphorical uses, especially in fields like cryptocurrency. Modern ecosystems, unlike their biological counterparts, transcend space and time through the internet, requiring careful, open-ended design to thrive.
